title: Acting helps girl recover from brain surgery
text:
Published By: Lafayette Journal: Life - Today 
Eight-year-old Grace Lorton's passion gave her a sense of herself after undergoing an operation for Chiari malformation. ... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
